document.description: Berlitz Where to Go in Hong Kong
document.name: WhereToHongKong

lexUnit.definition: COD: a pebbly or sandy shore at the edge of the sea or a lake. NB: this is actually a radial category, with "sandy shore of a sea" as the center, and either the sandy or the sea contradictable. In addition, a beach is required to be fairly flat.
